titles.title: In Everything Give Thanks, For This Is The Will Of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God.
In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God.
In everything give thanks, for this is the will of God
In Christ Jesus concerning you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pray without ceasing, etc.
Quench not the Spirit, etc.
Rejoice evermore, etc.
Despise not prophesyings, etc.
Prove all things, hold fast that which is good, etc.
